name: WordPress BeBookmak Plugin
author: Yasarzade

sections.description: Bebookmark plugin integrates a table right side of single post to make post easy for sharing on bookmark sites
sections.installation:
1. Upload the whole plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
  3. And then go to single.php in your theme, find

<

div class=”entry”> and right after it paste this code to display the table.
4. If there is not a “div class” like above in your single.php, you can paste the code right after the

<

div> which content query starts. 5. and lasty if there is something wrong with the layout of plugin in your theme look at the style.css file, there is a additional line for you. 6. and if you still have problem with plugin pls visit here;

http://birkalem.com/ilk-wordpress-eklentim-kullanimda

and report it by your comment.

short_description: Bebookmark plugin integrates a table right side of single post to make post easy for sharing on bookmark sites
